item.description:
Join us as we discuss the novel How the Garcia Girls Lost Their Accents by Julia Alvarez.

Fifteen tales vividly chronicle a Dominican family's exile in the Bronx, focusing on the four Garcia daughters' rebellion against their immigrant elders.

We will meet in the cafe area at the front of the store and will place a copy of the book on the table so that new people can more easily find us.

Feel free to bring suggestions for our next book.

You can see past books selected by this group here: http://www.goodreads....
item.how_to_find_us: We will place a copy of the book on the table
item.name: South Shore Readers: How the Garcia Girls Lost Their Accents
